t: History – William Marples and Sons, Ltd.
s: 1938 ‘BB‘ brand wooden planes started [beechwood planes that were machine made as an alternative to the hand made wooden planes which were still offered as an alternative but at a higher price]. 1940 Jan Peter Stewart Marples, son of John Kent, entered the business.
